Jembatan di Montigo Resorts Batam Roboh Lukai Belasan WNA, Ini Penyebabnya
07 Nov 2019, 20:37 by Agus Siswanto Siagian
Batam - Jembatan di area Montigo Resorts Batam, Kepulauan Riau, roboh. Belasan WNA terluka.
Kabid Humas Polda Kepri Kombes S Erlangga menjelaskan peristiwa robohnya bagian tengah jembatan yang menjorok ke pantai itu terjadi pada pukul 16.06 WIB, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Saat peristiwa itu terjadi, ada lebih dari 20 WN Singapura yang berada di jembatan untuk berfoto.
"Jembatan yang roboh disebabkan kemungkinan pondasi jembatan yang berupa kayu itu sudah lapuk jadi mengakibatkan robohnya jembatan," kata Erlangga di RS Bhayangkara Batam.
Erlangga menyebut ada 13 orang terluka yang dibawa ke RS Bhayangkara. Lima orang lainnya yang mengalami luka ringan ditangani di lokasi.
"Dari 13 orang, ada dua orang luka berat," sambungnya.
Polisi sudah melakukan olah tempat kejadian perkara dan pemeriksaan sejumlah saksi.

The Bridge at Montigo Resorts Batam has collapsed injured dozens of foreigners, this is the cause
Nov 7 2019, 20:37 by Agus Siswanto Siagian
Batam - The bridge in the Montigo Resorts area of Batam, Riau Islands, collapsed. Dozens of foreigners injured.
Head of Public Relations of the Riau Islands Police Commissioner S Erlangga explained the event of the collapse of the middle part of the bridge that jutted to the beach occurred at 16.06 WIB, Thursday (11/07/2019).
When the incident happened, there were more than 20 Singaporeans who were on the bridge to take pictures.
"The bridge that collapsed due to the possibility of the bridge foundation in the form of wood that has rotted, resulting in the collapse of the bridge," said Erlangga in Batam Bhayangkara Hospital.
Erlangga said there were 13 injured who were taken to Bhayangkara Hospital. Five other people who suffered minor injuries were treated on site.
"Of the 13 people, there were two people seriously injured," he continued.
The police have conducted the crime scene and the examination of a number of witnesses.
